resources.string: Home - Here show for you the last three song that was played. For the screen I used just TextViews to compose, and the selected menu is standard for others activities too. The menu below was created using TextView using "android:drawableTop" to set images. I connected them using intents inside the setOnClickListener method, the behavior is, when the user click, specified intent is called.

Search Screen - Here its useful to search some song that have inside your library ou phone. I used TextView for compose the screen, and I used "android:drawableLeft" to set the image in the left side of the "SearchTextView"
Library Screen - Here is useful to choose what Artist, Album or song that you want to hear. I used intents for called the specified activity.

Artist Screen - this displays a list of songs based on the chosen artist. This uses ListView and ArrayAdapter to display the list. When clicked on any list item, the method "setOnItemClickListener" is called and directs the user for artist chosen.

Genre Screen - Here is possible to choose which genre that you want. This uses ListView and ArrayAdapter to display the list. When clicked on any list item, the method "setOnItemClickListener" is called and directs the user for genre chosen.

Songs Screen - This view show the list with all songs available in this option. This uses ListView and ArrayAdapter to display the list. I have difficult here because when I implemented the Header, when I touched him, I had problems with listView was touched. I made this just set onItemClick method to the found position will be = "-1"
Media Player - This screen have all controls for you play, pause or stop songs.
